home.meta_description: Hearth — your landing page. Discover more.

hero.subtitle: Hearth helps you build a stronger, more intimate relationship through shared memories, daily questions, and meaningful interactions.

features.section_title: Everything you need to grow closer
features.section_subtitle: Designed by relationship experts to help you foster intimacy, trust, and joy in your relationship.
features.shared_memories_desc: Build a beautiful, living timeline of your relationship's most precious photos and moments.
features.daily_prompts_desc: Spark deep, meaningful conversations with a new thought-provoking question every single day.
features.private_chat_desc: A secure, intimate space for your conversations, away from the noise of other social apps.
features.appreciation_desc: Send virtual hugs, love notes, and stickers to show your partner they're appreciated.
features.streaks_desc: Track your relationship consistency and celebrate key anniversaries and milestones together.
features.privacy_first_desc: Your data is end-to-end encrypted and visible only to the two of you. Your digital sanctuary.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.subtitle: Three simple steps to start building a deeper connection today.
how_it_works.step_1_desc: Sign up and send a unique invite link to your partner to connect your accounts.
how_it_works.step_2_desc: Answer one fun or deep question every day to unlock your partner's answer.
how_it_works.step_3_desc: Watch your relationship deepen as you build a habit of appreciation and openness.

testimonials.section_subtitle: Discover how Hearth is helping couples around the world build deeper, more meaningful connections.
testimonials.quote_1: Hearth changed how we communicate. The daily prompts spark conversations we wouldn't have otherwise. It feels like we're dating again.
testimonials.quote_2: I love the private timeline. It's like our own little social network, just for us, without the noise. The aesthetic is just beautiful.
testimonials.quote_3: The best investment we've made for our relationship this year. It keeps us connected despite our busy schedules.

faq.q1_answer: Yes! Hearth has a generous free tier that includes daily questions and basic memory sharing. Hearth Premium unlocks unlimited memories, advanced insights, and more.
faq.q2_question: Can I use Hearth for a long-distance relationship?
faq.q2_answer: Absolutely. Hearth is designed to bridge the gap between couples, whether you're in the same room or thousands of miles apart.
faq.q3_answer: Privacy is our top priority. Your conversations and photos are encrypted and only accessible by you and your partner. We do not sell your data.
faq.q4_question: What if we break up? (Sad, but practical)
faq.q4_answer: You can easily export your data or delete your account permanently. Your data belongs to you.

cta.title: Ready to prioritize your relationship?
cta.subtitle: Join the community of couples who are intentionally building a better future together.

footer.tagline: Making the world a more loving place, one couple at a time.
